data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

As ____ has ____, ____ are ____ gaps ____ the ____ readiness ____ children ____ varying ____ economic ____. In order for all children to be prepared for kindergarten, there must be a universal accessibility to a proper policy driven early childhood education system.
data.partBlankContent: Future progress of the current education system in America is dependant on the implementation of an early education program. As rese____ has demons______, th___ are treme_____ gaps bet____ the sch___ readiness o_ children fr__ varying soc___ economic backg______. data.fullContent: Future progress of the current education system in America is dependant on the implementation of an early education program. As research has demonstrated, there are tremendous gaps between the school readiness of children from varying social economic backgrounds. In order for all children to be prepared for kindergarten, there must be a universal accessibility to a proper policy driven early childhood education system.
data.answer: 美国当前教育体系的未来发展取决于早期教育项目的实施。研究表明，来自不同社会经济背景的儿童在入学准备方面存在巨大差距。为了让所有儿童为上幼儿园做好准备，必须普及适当的政策驱动的早期儿童教育体系。
